thread.title: Toronto Blue Jays-Kansas City Royals: Live stream, score updates, TV channel (MLB Playoffs 2015, ALCS Game 5)
thread.title_full: Toronto Blue Jays-Kansas City Royals: Live stream, score updates, TV channel (MLB Playoffs 2015, ALCS Game 5) | OregonLive.com

author: JD Humburg | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Toronto Blue Jays-Kansas City Royals: Live stream, score updates, TV channel (MLB Playoffs 2015, ALCS Game 5)
text:
The Toronto Blue Jays are currently leading the Kansas City Royals 1-0 in the fifth inning of Game 5 of the American League Championship Series in Toronto after Chris Colabello most recently crushed a solo homer off Edinson Volquez in the bottom of the second.
We'll have live inning-by-inning updates right here throughout the game.
4th inning - Royals get their first hit when Alcides Escobar leads off with a single, but he's erased when Ben Zobrist grounds into a double play. The bottom half goes similarly for the Blue Jays: Jose Bautista leads off with a single, but Chris Colabello grounds into a double play. Blue Jays 1, Royals 0.
3rd inning - A quick third inning as both teams go down in order. Pitch counts through three: Estrada 36, Volquez 38. Blue Jays 1, Royals 0.
2nd inning - Another perfect inning for Marco Estrada. In the bottom half, the Blue Jays strike first on a solo homer by Chris Colabello. It could have been a two-run shot, but Royals first baseman Eric Hosmer made a spectacular over-the-shoulder catch on Edwin Encarnacion's popup leading off the inning. Blue Jays 1, Royals 0.
1st inning - It's 6 up, 6 down in the first as both Marco Estrada and Edinson Volquez look sharp early. Royals 0, Blue Jays 0.
***
PREGAME :
The Toronto Blue Jays and Kansas City Royals resume the best-of-seven American League Championship Series with Wednesday's Game 5 in Toronto, where the Royals can punch their ticket to the World Series with another win.
Here are the details:
What : Kansas City Royals at Toronto Blue Jays in ALCS Game 5. Kansas City leads series 3-1.
Where : Rogers Centre, Toronto
When : Wednesday, October 21, at 1:07 p.m. PT/4:07 p.m. ET
What TV channel : TV on FS1, radio on KMTT (910 AM) in Portland area
Online live stream : Watch online at Fox Sports Go . Listen at ESPNRadio.com .
Live updates : Follow along in the comments section below for live updates during the game
Pitching matchup : Kansas City's Edinson Volquez vs. Toronto's Marco Estrada
Playoff schedule : Bookmark our MLB scoreboard for postseason scores and schedules.
